summary: This is an email chain regarding a federal trial subpoena. A Special Agent from the FBI's New York Field Office (Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking) sends a trial subpoena to an individual, who responds confirming they have requested time off from work and will provide updates.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Sends a trial subpoena from the FBI New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force.

persons.name: Des
persons.context: Recipient of the federal trial subpoena who responds that they have requested time off from work and will provide updates.

connections.description: The Special Agent serves a federal trial subpoena to Des, indicating Des is likely a witness or subject in a legal proceeding.

events.title: Trial Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Special Agent from the FBI's New York Field Office sends a federal trial subpoena to Des.

events.title: Response to Subpoena
events.description: Des responds to the subpoena, indicating they have requested time off from work to comply and will provide updates.

keyFacts: A federal trial subpoena was issued in November 2021 related to a case handled by the FBI's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force in New York.
The recipient of the subpoena (Des) is coordinating time off from work to comply with the legal demand.
The communication indicates an ongoing federal trial or legal proceeding related to child exploitation or human trafficking.
